title: Honey BBQ chicken kebabs
ingredients: ['2 large chicken breast fillets', 'red onion and peppers (optional)', 'For the dry rub', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'For the honey BBQ glaze', '1 tablespoon BBQ sauce, more to taste', '1 tablespoon honey, more to taste']
